thread.title: 19 Blouses to Solve All Your Workwear Problems
thread.title_full: 19 Blouses to Solve All Your Workwear Problems -- The Cut

author: Lindsay Peoples
title: 19 Blouses to Solve All Your Workwear Problems
text:
View Slideshow
Blouses are still trending on the spring 2016 runways, but they're just as popular on the street. And no wonder: They're versatile, they're easy to layer, and when you wear a nice one to work, you feel like a grown-up. We've picked out 19 of our favorites, from sheer-yet-demure options by Anna Sui and Frame Denim to Victorian bibs complete with ruffles at H&M. Want to tie yours at the neck like a street-style star? Try Mango's striped version, or Valentino's polka-dot take. The best part: Because blouses are so ubiquitous, you can find them at every price point. Click through the slideshow for our favorites, plus tips on how to incorporate them into your fall wardrobe.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
